name: Socratic Engineering Method
description: Combines Socratic questioning with engineering problem-solving for deep understanding

Initial_Question.hint: What do you want to understand?

Assumptions.hint: What do you assume to be true?

Evidence_Required.hint: What proof or data do you need?

template: Explore {Initial_Question} by questioning {Assumptions}. Examine {Evidence_Required} and consider {Alternative_Perspectives}. Analyze {Implications} and reflect on {Meta_Questions} to build deep understanding.
